result.title: Announcement: CPG Selection Test 2018
result.content:
Hello, everyone!

CPG Selection Test 2017-18 will be held on January 7, 2018 at 18:00 hrs

The contest is ICPC-style. Each problem has 1 point. The penalty for a problem equals time taken (in minutes) to solve the problem from the start of the contest + 20 ×  number of rejected solutions. Total penalty equals the sum of penalties of solved problems.

The contest has been prepared by me (GT_18), hitman623, Enigma27, _shanky. You will have 5 hours to solve 7 problems.

The problems are sorted by difficulty according to me, but I'll advise you to read all problems.

Hope you'll find the problems interesting. Good luck!
